explains: v. （使）膨胀；膨胀；腌熏（鲱鱼）（bloat 的过去式及过去分词）
adj. （身体部位）肿起的；臃肿的；生活奢侈的；饮食过度的

sentences.en: I felt bloated after the huge meal they'd served.
sentences.cn: 吃过他们提供的大餐后，我觉得肚子胀得很。

sentences.en: Her features had been bloated by years of drinking.
sentences.cn: 她酗酒多年，已变得面部浮肿。

sentences.en: Diners do not want to leave the table feeling bloated.
sentences.cn: 用餐者们不想离开餐桌的时候感到肚胀。
